remarks.format: ## Remarks 使您能够执行功能，如命中测试、 剪裁和擦除笔画。The enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes. 控件将执行许多这样的功能，但是如果您需要更多的控制权提供了，提供更多选项。The control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the provides, the offers more options. 下表列出了要了解如何管理自定义控件上的数字墨迹的位置。The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control. |若要执行此操作...To do this…|请参阅这篇文章See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |创建收集数字墨迹控件Create a control that collects digital ink|[创建墨迹输入控件Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)| |创建的控件，使用户能够选择墨迹Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[如何： 从自定义控件选择墨迹How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)| |创建允许用户为点擦除墨迹的控件。Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[如何： 清除自定义控件上的墨迹How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values |术语Term|定义Definition| |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|一个字符串，表示笔画采用 base-64 编码的墨迹序列化格式 (ISF)。A string that represents the stroke in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在一个复制墨迹到另一种。The following example demonstrates how to copy the ink in one onto another . 此示例假定：This example assumes: - 有两个对象调用`inkCanvas1`和`inkCanvas2`。There are two objects called `inkCanvas1` and `inkCanvas2`. - 事件已连接到事件处理程序。The event has been connected to the event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回，将视为"命中"当套索路径环绕在其周围。The method returns an that considers a to be "hit" when the lasso path surrounds it. 这可用于实现的功能，例如选择具有套索工具笔画的能力。This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to select a stroke with a lasso tool. 使用实现套索选择工具。The uses an to implement the lasso selection tool. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取，使用户能够使用套索工具选择笔画。The following example demonstrates how to get an that enables a user to select strokes with a lasso tool. 若要创建使用户能够选择墨迹的控件，请参阅[如何： 从自定义控件选择墨迹](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)。To create a control that enables a user to select ink, see [How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生的类可以处理该事件，而不必附加委托，委托是用于处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`applyToStylusTip`是`true`，则方法会影响触笔笔尖的形状以及笔画的位置。When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes. 例如，如果您旋转90 度笔画移动轴和似乎反向时点的高度和宽度的笔画。For example, if you rotate a 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何移动所有笔画。The following example demonstrates how to move all the strokes on an . 此示例假定有调用`inkCanvas1`。This example assumes that there is an called `inkCanvas1`. [!code-csharp[StrokeCollectionMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StrokeCollectionMethods/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[StrokeCollectionMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StrokeCollectionMethods/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#9)]
